DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develope web-based cognitive behavioral therapy Korean adoldescents mild depression . And investigate whether web-based cognitive behavioral therapy effective supportive psychotherapy treat depressed adolescent . Our hypothesis web- base cognitive behavioral effective supportive psychotherapy
DOC.brief_title: Study Web- Based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Depressed Korean Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: We recruit adolescent ( age 12-18 year old ) diagnosis major depressive disorder , dysthymia depressive disorder NOS outpatient clinic child adolescent psychiatry advertise recruitment subject community . The study protocol approve Institutional Review Board Hallym university sacred heart hospital . Well- trained interviewer conduct assessment participant parent guardian . The assessment include diagnostic interview , demographic characteristic , depressive symptom severity scale , Columbia suicide severity rating scale , questionnaire abuse history . We decide number participant 164 , previous study , web- base cognitive behavioral therapy show mild moderate effect size ( effect size = 0.43 ) . So examining hypothesis , recruit 164 adolescent calculate number participant use G power program version 3.1.3 . ( level significance = 5 % , power hypothesis test = 80 % , drop rate = 20 % ) And conduct randomize control trial examine efficacy web- base cognitive behavioral therapy . Our hypothesis web- base cognitive behavioral effective supportive psychotherapy , deliver web- base cognitive behavioral therapy program cognitive behavioral therapy group 8 week ( week ) , supportive psychotherapy supportive psychotherapy group 8 week ( week ) We exclude participant participant severe depressive symptom , definite suicidal idea , plan attempt , psychotic symptom , bipolar disorder , sexual abuse history , neurological disease receive cognitive behavioral therapy , pharmacotherapy interpersonal psychotherapy . We analyze intent- to- treat population . For individual , miss value replace last observed value variable . And use Chi square test repeat measure-ANOVA .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis major depressive disorder , dysthymic disorder depressive disorder NOS participants parent agree inform consent participant psychotic symptom , developmental disorder , participant diagnose bipolar disorder participant current high risk suicide participant psychiatric physical symptom need urgent medicine treatment participant history sexual abuse participant cognitive behavioral therapy interpersonal psychotherapy within 3 month participant history brain injury neurological disorder seizure disorder , severe physical disorder
